item.title: upstart 설정
item.description: /etc/init/appname.conf description "appname" author "xxx" start on startup stop on shutdown chdir /home/xxx/appname respawn script export HOME="/home/xxx" export AWS\_ACCESS\_KEY_ID= export AWS\_SECRET\_ACCESS_KEY= exec /home/xxx/appname/app -c="config.json" end script $ sudo initctl reload-configuration $ sudo start appname Refrence systemd
